column5: a Chinese man was seen in a state of mental breakdown. ------He was in the street making strange gestures and shouting at things.------The incident took place in  ------Pochentong------
column6: along Russian Blvd. in Por Senchey district. The Chinese man was unidentified
column8: the man had a slight accident when he was hit by a car------  when acting strangely in the road.------Worried about public safety
column9: he was taken by the police and will be handed over to the immigration office for management and supervision.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/269739------
